decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with key creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent, then using spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back to the battlefield for a powerful advantage. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces and prevent opponents from interfering. Additionally, cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide card advantage and help dig for combo pieces. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo and overwhelm opponents with powerful reanimated creatures.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo- Reanimator strategy to quickly bring powerful creatures back from the graveyard, such as Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent, to overwhelm the opponent. It includes a mix of control elements like Daze and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan, along with card selection and card advantage from cards like Tamiyo, Brainstorm, and Ponder. The deck also includes protection with Force of Will and disruptive land destruction with Wasteland to further control the game.

The main focus of this Dragon Stompy deck is to disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void while also ramping up quickly with cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Sundering Eruption and Pyrogoyf to close out the game. Overall, the strategy revolves around locking down the opponent's resources and overwhelming them with aggressive threats.

The primary strategy of this UR Aggro Legacy deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets and Murktide Regent, supported by powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Force of Will to control the board. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by using cards like Daze and Wasteland while maintaining card advantage and consistency through cards like Ponder and Brainstorm. Overall, the deck aims to win the game swiftly through aggressive plays and disrupting the opponent's strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing various artifacts and mana generators to generate a powerful combo that allows the player to manipulate the top of their library and play cards without paying their mana cost. The key strategy involves using Mystic Forge to play cards from the top of the library combined with artifacts like Basalt Monolith and Voltaic Key to generate mana and untap permanents, creating a powerful engine that can quickly overwhelm the opponent. Additionally, cards like Tezzeret, Karn, and Ugin provide additional utility and control elements to support the combo.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures, such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. It also contains disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. The deck aims to outpace and overwhelm the opponent by using a combination of fast graveyard recursion and control elements, establishing a powerful board presence early in the game.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, then bringing them back with spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. It includes disruption and protection in the form of cards like Force of Will and Daze, as well as removal like Fatal Push. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big, impactful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while maintaining control through cards like Brainstorm and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The deck aims to win through powerful combos and efficient reanimation.

The deck focuses on utilizing reanimation spells like Reanimate and Entomb to fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty, while also controlling the game with disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Daze. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps dig for combo pieces and Atraxa, Grand Unifier provides additional value. The deck aims to quickly assemble a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent with its efficient and resilient threats, while also disrupting their game plan with countermagic and hand disruption.

The focus of this deck is to quickly generate mana through cards like Dark Ritual, Chrome Mox, Mox Opal, and Lotus Petal, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Duress, Thoughtseize, and Cabal Therapy. The deck aims to combo off by casting multiple spells in a single turn, ultimately winning the game with Tendrils of Agony or Ad Nauseam. The inclusion of Wishclaw Talisman and Burning Wish allows for additional flexibility in finding the necessary combo pieces or answers to the opponent's threats. The deck also utilizes cards like Urza's Saga and Beseech the Mirror for additional card advantage and consistency.

The main concept of this Death & Taxes Aggro deck is to use disruptive cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Force of Will to control the opponent's strategy while quickly building a board presence with creatures like Starfield Shepherd and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd. This deck also utilizes cards like Swords to Plowshares and Mockingbird to remove threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. It aims to apply pressure on the opponent through its aggressive creatures while keeping the opponent on the back foot with disruptive spells and abilities.

The main concept of this Aggro - Weenie White deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle using low-cost creatures and powerful spells such as Swords to Plowshares. The deck focuses on applying early pressure and disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, while also utilizing Anthem effects like Force of Virtue to boost the power of the team. The deck aims to close out the game quickly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize, using a combination of creatures and removal spells to secure victory.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, and then bringing them back onto the battlefield with spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. It also includes counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo. The deck aims to win by overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty, or by utilizing the card advantage provided by Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The land base includes crucial mana fixing and disruption with cards like Wasteland.

The main focus of this deck is to consistently deal damage quickly and efficiently to the opponent through a combination of direct burn spells and aggressive creature attacks. By utilizing a low mana curve and high damage output cards such as Goblin Guide and Lightning Bolt, this deck aims to pressure the opponent's life total early on and finish them off with powerful finishers like Fireblast and Price of Progress. The inclusion of Eidolon of the Great Revel also punishes opponents for playing non-creature spells, adding an additional layer of disruption to the game plan.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures, using cards like Entomb and Reanimate to bring them back into play. It includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect its combo pieces, while also utilizing Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student for card advantage and selection. The main win condition is to reanimate heavy hitters like Atraxa, Grand Unifier or Archon of Cruelty to quickly close out the game. The deck also includes utility lands like Wasteland and efficient removal like Brazen Borrower to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy.

This Grixis Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while maintaining card advantage. With a combination of efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push, along with powerful disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Narset, Parter of Veils, the deck aims to control the board and opponent's resources. The deck also includes card draw options like Brainstorm and Ponder to find key cards quickly. Additionally, the deck has a versatile win condition with cards like Murktide Regent and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying small, efficient creatures onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. It makes use of disruptive cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Spirit of the Labyrinth to slow down the opponent's game plan. Stoneforge Mystic and equipment like Umezawa's Jitte and Kaldra Compleat provide additional threats and utility. Aether Vial allows for creatures to be put into play at instant speed, keeping the pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Path to Exile and Swords to Plowshares to deal with opposing threats.
